name: e5e83511-20c4-5604-b2fa-da773e70dbd8
notes: This service provides nephelometer measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at SIRTA Atmospheric Research Observatory, France (20120101 - 20140101). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at SIRTA Atmospheric Research Observatory, France (20120101 - 20140101)
